ml_tags: Died 18th Jan 1977 Aged 69 Years Loving Father of Susan,Joseph and Davinia Dearly loved Husband of Leofua 26 Jan 1999 21 Sept 2022 Beloved Son of Davinia Cherished brother of Laina and Italya David SOLOMON Clement "CJ" Uncle of Leila-Rose and Luca "No longer by our side but forever in our hearts"
